Author: Ruben Hansen-Rojas
Last Updated: June 07, 2017

1. Verify simple-oauth-server exists in Git/Backend/ClientServices/node_modules. If not, do a ‘nom install’ from the
   ClientServices directory. 
2. Replace the delivered validateAccessToken.js file from ClientServices/node_modules/simple-oauth-server/lib with this local one. Be sure to overwrite or save the original elsewhere.
